mapper.update: update file_post set post_id = #{post_id}, is_using = true, create_at = now() where link_id = #{link_id}
mapper.select: select * from file_post order by create_at desc

SELECT p.post_id AS post_id, p.content, p.create_at, f.file_id AS file_id, f.up_filename, f.file_path, u.tag_id AS tag_id FROM post p LEFT JOIN file_post fp ON p.post_id = fp.post_id LEFT JOIN file_list f ON fp.file_id = f.file_id LEFT JOIN user u ON p.write_user = u.uuid WHERE p.write_user = #{uuid} AND fp.is_using = 1 ORDER BY p.create_at DESC;

SELECT p.post_id AS post_id, p.content, p.create_at, f.file_id AS file_id, f.up_filename, f.file_path, u.tag_id AS tag_id FROM post p LEFT JOIN file_post fp ON p.post_id = fp.post_id LEFT JOIN file_list f ON fp.file_id = f.file_id LEFT JOIN user u ON p.write_user = u.uuid WHERE p.content LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") AND fp.is_using = 1 ORDER BY p.create_at DESC;
